amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $819.5 million from NASA's science, aeronautics, and technology appropriation to the Corporation for National Community Service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in the Congressional Record of July 26 as amendment No. 41, to appropriate $819 million for the AmeriCorps National Service Program and decreases by the same amount the funding for NASA's science, aeronautics, and technology account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fields (LA) amendment (A020) Failed by voice vote.
